title: is riot still giving 400 RP free for beginners
body: So my friend told me i can get 400 RP when i start playing league and i saw this champ skin on sale and is saving up to buy the champ, So is riot still giving beginners 400 RP? Thank you.

replies.body: Riot give **NEW ACCOUNTS** 400 RP.

Not anymore. 
Since the introduction of hex tech crafting all new accounts receive a special hextech chest upon reaching level 3 **in place of** the RP they would have received in previous years.

>It includes an Ashe champion shard, a Garen champ shard, and enough essence to craft both of them. We’re also including a semi-random skin shard for either Garen (Sanguine) or Ashe (Sherwood).


Read more about it (including the reasons behind the change) [HERE ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)

Trouble is, they can't access this chest until Hextech Crafting unlocks at level 5. That's about 1/20 of the time someone spends on the way to lv 30 spent without getting any Hextech Crafting whatsoever.

The required experience is increased each time you level up, E.G:
Level 7 requirements are 322XP to level up.
Level 15 requirements are 709XP to level up.
Level 30 requirements are 1340XP to level up.

So getting to level 5 from level 1 isn't that difficult. Compared to getting from level 29 to level 30

^ It takes approx 4-6 25minute games to reach level 5 if playing co-op vs AI on any difficulty. 

New players aren't missing out on anything, Ashe and Garen are both available on the pre-6 free week rotation.

The only thing they could be "missing out on", is a skin, but when you are new to the game you don't really GAF about aesthetics when you are trying to learn all the mechanics.
